EmailTemplate.name: STANLIB LISP Triage
EmailTemplate.subject: Reviewed and in progress: {!Case.Subject}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Case.Contact},
We have reviewed your email and can confirm that {!Case.OwnerFullName} is working closely with the respective STANLIB team to provide you with the information you require.
If you have any questions, please do not hesitate to call us on {!Case.OwnerPhone}, with your reference number {!Case.CaseNumber}.
Regards, STANLIB Client Experience: LISP
{!Case.Email_Thread}
